required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Multiple Ascending Dose Study to Assess Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Hemay005 In Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Study of Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of Hemay005 Tablets in Single and Multiple Doses in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: Hemay005 is a novel phosphodiesterase type 4(PDE4) inhibitor being developed for the treatment of psoriasis. There were 3 dose cohorts (75mg, 90mg, 105mg) with 12 healthy subjects in each cohorts (6 males and 6 females). This study includes an 11-day Screening Period, a 1-day single dose and 7-days multiple doses Treatment Period.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of adverse events (AEs), related AEs and serious AEs (SAEs)
primary_outcome.description: All subjects who receive the drug will be analyzed for safety, and the safety evaluation will refer to CTCAE 5.0 standard.

arm_group.description: 15mg/tablet. Five tablets (75mg) each time. Participants will receive a single dose of Hemay005 tablet in Day 1 followed by twice a day of Hemay005 tablet in Day 3~Day8 and single dose in Day9.
15mg/tablet. Six tablets (90mg) each time. Participants will receive a single dose of Hemay005 tablet in Day 1 followed by twice a day of Hemay005 tablet in Day 3~Day8 and single dose in Day9.
15mg/tablet. Seven tablets (105mg) each time. Participants will receive a single dose of Hemay005 tablet in Day 1 followed by twice a day of Hemay005 tablet in Day 3~Day8 and single dose in Day9.

facility.name: Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hospital of Sun Yat-sen University
